parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: uuid of internet gateway to query

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: uuid of internet gateway to update

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: uuid of internet gateway to delete

ComplexResultResponse.description: Complex Result Response, batch query result

gatewayInterface.description: BDIF interface name, when vni is not null and need to read from AC, pass this parameter to lower layer

isVirtual.description: whether is a virtual network element

routeType.description: route type, staic route or policy route, currently noly support static route

deployCloudCpeByDefault.description: whether to start cloudcpe when create site

wanNames.description: Name of wan interface used for internet
